0.title: Inzira nyabagendwa

12.title: Kunyura hagati y'imirongo ibiri ibangikanye y'ibinyabiziga bikurikiranye
points: Abayobozi b'amagare na velomoteri babujijwe kunyura hagati y'imirongo ibiri ibangikanye y'ibinyabiziga bikurikiranye

12.title: Kwambara ingofero yo kwirinda yabigenewe
points: Abayobozi n'abagenzi bari ku magare cyangwa velomoteri bagomba kwambara ingofero yo kwirinda yabigenewe
Iyo ngofero igomba kuba ifunze ku buryo bufashe

12.title: Abo aya mabwiriza atareba
points: Abasirikare bagenda ku murongo
Abarushanwa kwihuta cyangwa bari mu masiganwa babifitiye uruhushya

12.title: Igihe umuyobozi agomba gukurura akanyamizigo ke cyangwa ingorofani
points: igihe imizigo idatuma umuyobozi areba imbere ye neza

12.title: Igihe ingorofani zinyuzwa ku nkengero z'umuhanda zegutse
points: Iyo inzira nyabagendwa idafite inkengero cyangwa iyo hatagendeka
